ValidationRule.description: When a candidate is rejected, the "Candidate has been notified" checkbox has to be checked before the task can be marked complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Candidate_Approval", ISPICKVAL( Approval_Decision__c , "Reject" ), Candidate_has_been_notified__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Completed") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Because the Approval Decision is "Rejected" the "Candidate has been notified" checkbox must be checked before this Task can be marked "Completed".
